credit_line: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
title: Rose and Mask
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
description: Cylindrical, with rounded bottom, slightly flaring to lip, loop handle withmolded foliate pattern at joining to body; painted with black and gilded rose blossom, leaves, grotesque mask around sides; thin gilded and black band around rim
name: Cup
